Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 47th overall pick, by Miami in 2016...
Traded from Miami to Pittsburgh on 3/31/2016 (Going to PIT: RF Gregorio Valladares. Going to MIA: CF Senquez Golson)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/2019, off Mike Mayers (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/26/2019, off Steven Chang (LAD)...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 2019...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $671,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
10/28/2024: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $1,300,000 per year, for 2 years.
10/26/2026: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $2,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/17/2027...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 4/24/2027 to a 1-year deal worth $712,000 per year...
Released by Baltimore on 10/9/2027...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/3/2028 to a 2-year deal worth $2,047,000 per year...
